name: The 0.01px trick
description:
Figma is an awesome tool and made the designer’s life even easier especially after taking out the AUTO-LAYOUT feature. But, for the time being, there is an issue.

You can’t have the vertical & horizontal auto-layout at the same time. This maybe makes sense but there are certain cases where the designer needs both modes on - especially when horizontal stretching is desired.


This method is based on the VAL and imitates the HAL. It is not 100% suitable for multi-column layouts but solves every-day issues that arise when building micro-layouts such as list items, cards, teasers etc.
